Package actions

It contains all actions runnable from UI, double-clicks and context menu options.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Add_Check_to_EVL
    It adds Check statement to EVL tree
    Add_Constraint_to_EVL
    It adds a Constraint to selected Context
    Add_Critique_to_EVL
    It adds a Critique to selected Context
    Add_Do_operation_to_EVL
    This action adds operation of refactoring to EVL
    Add_Fix_to_EVL
    It adds a Fix to the EVL tree
    Add_Message_to_EVL
    It allows to add the Message (quotes must be inserted manually)
    Add_Operation_to_Check
    It adds operations to EVL check
    Add_TH_operation_to_EVL
    This action adds operation of refactoring to EVL
    Add_Title_to_EVL_Fix
    It allows to add a title to the selected Fix of EVL (quotes are to be added manually)
    DoubleClick_EOL_operation_Action
    It opens a new editor part to work the operation selected
    Export_EVL_as_XML
    It allows to export the EVL data structure as an XML file
    Hook_Do_operation_Context_Menu
    This action filters the library by Do-type operations of the context passed as argument and activates context menu on these operations.
    Hook_F_operation_Context_Menu
    This action filters the library by F-type operations of the context passed as argument and activates context menu on these operations.
    Hook_TH_operation_Context_Menu
    This action filters the library by F-type operations of the context passed as argument and activates context menu on these operations.
    Import_EVL_from_XML
    It allows to parse an XML containing an EVL data structure
    NewEOL_operation_Action  
    Save_EPL_file_Action
    It saves the EVL tree as an EPL file code
    Save_EVL_file_Action
    It saves the EVL tree as an EVL file code
    Save_EWL_file_Action
    It saves the EVL tree as an EWL file code
    Save_operation_OnDB_Action  

Package actions Description

It contains all actions runnable from UI, double-clicks and context menu options.
Author:
Stefano
